title: Wizards & Whores
description: Anna is a whore.On the eve of her 18th birthday, her parents sell her into prostitution. Her only solace is Shanae, a seasoned prostitute who shows her the ropes and the bright side.Tom is a wizard. He's just not a very good one. In order to prove himself, he has to take on ten fantastical tasks. As it happens, his first task leads him to a whorehouse...Wizards & Whores is best described as a cross between Harry Potter & Pretty Woman. It is an epic fantasy & romantic comedy, approximately 70,000 words.
author: Addison Garr
